doc.previous: Some linguists especially when discussing the modern Chinese varieties use the terms final and rime rhyme interchangeably In historical Chinese phonology however the distinction between final including the medial and rime not including the medial is important in understanding the rime dictionaries and rime tables that form the primary sources for Middle Chinese and as a result most authors distinguish the two according to the above definition
